attributes.action: A fair go for all commonwealth Ex Pat pensioners
attributes.additional_details:
British pensioners in Australia, Canada, NewZealand and other parts of the commonwealth have had their pension frozen since the day they were started. If you live anywhere else you get the full pension indexed on a regular basis but we others suffer financial lost due to the erosion of the pensions value. "THIS IS GROSSLY UNFAIR"
We want the British government to address this problem and restore ALL back pay and then index ALL pesions the same irrespective of where they choose to spend their retirement.
